name: Ryan Toys Fly
description:
Amazing Fly adventure is waiting for you!
Amazing Ryan Fly is an amazing action game. Ryan Hero go to a journey to rescuse some one.
Superhero Ryan Fly has super power by using a hoverboard to fly, step on, drive or tilt while reaching maximum flight distance!
Destroy enemy armored cars, attack helicopters, and defeat the boss in this superhero game!
With a very fast rocket launcher, he flies to face the enemy facing him. Caution! all enemies are ready to destroy and obstruct your mission. Collect as many coins as possible, and complete the mission!
Features :
- Beautiful high graphics
- Many items of skill and support
- Fly, step on, drive or pack funny copters
- Complete more than 99 challenging mission levels
- Collect coins as much as you can
